history.proof: intros m Hmap. unfold surj_dart, cF_1. intros x Hexd. pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj. pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj. shelve.

ctx: pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj.
pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap Hmap : inv_hmap m x : dart Hexd : exd m x Hinj : inj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m) Hsurj : surj_dart (exd m) (cF m) The term "m" has type "fmap" while it is expected to have type "dart".

ctx: pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj.
pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap Hmap : inv_hmap m x : dart Hexd : exd m x Hinj : inj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m) Hsurj : surj_dart (exd m) (cF m) Unable to unify "surj_dart (exd m) (cF m)" with "exists x0 : dart, exd m x0 /\\ cA m zero (cA m one x0) = x".

ctx: pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj.
pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap Hmap : inv_hmap m x : dart Hexd : exd m x Hinj : inj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m) Hsurj : surj_dart (exd m) (cF m) Unable to unify "exd m x" with "exists x0 : dart, exd m x0 /\\ cA m zero (cA m one x0) = x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
surj_dart = fun (Df : dart -> Prop) (f : dart -> dart) => forall y : dart, Df y -> exists x : dart, Df x /\ f x = y : (dart -> Prop) -> (dart -> dart) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
inj_cF_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cF_1 m)
surj_cF : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cF m)
MA1.bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA1.f_1 m)
inj_cF : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cF m)
MA0.bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f_1 m)
MA1.bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA1.f m)
MA0.bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f m)
bij_cF : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cF m)
surj_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cA m k)
surj_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k)
McA0.bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m Md0.k)
McA1.bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA m Md1.k)
McA0.bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA m Md0.k)
McA1.bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m Md1.k)
bij_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA m k)
bij_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k)
inj_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k)
inj_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (exd m) (cA m k)
nd_card : forall m : fmap, ndN m = card (fmap_to_set m)
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
exd_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cF_1 m z)
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
MA0.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MA1.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA1.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MA1.exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f m) (MA1.Iter_upb m z) z)
MA0.exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) (MA0.Iter_upb m z) z)
MA0.Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (S i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i (MA0.f m z)
inj_neq : forall n m : nat, neq n m -> Zne (Z.of_nat n) (Z.of_nat m)
Zne_left : forall n m : Z, Zne n m -> Zne (n + - m) 0
MA1.Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA1.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA1.f m) i z -> Iter (MA1.f m) p z = z
MA0.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = Iter (MA0.f m) (i - j) z
MA1.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f_1 m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f_1 m) n z)
MA1.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f m) n z)
MA0.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z
MA1.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA1.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA1.f m) j z = Iter (MA1.f m) k z -> j = k
MA1.mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA1.Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (MA1.f m) i z = Iter (MA1.f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
MA0.mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
Nat2Z.inj_sub : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Z.of_nat (n - m) = Z.of_nat n - Z.of_nat m

```  
intros m Hmap. unfold surj_dart, cF_1. intros x Hexd. 
pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj.
pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj.
specialize (Hinj m Hmap) as [Hinj1 Hinj2].
apply Hsurj. apply Hinj1. apply Hexd.
```

original: intros m Hmap. unfold surj_dart, cF_1. intros x Hexd. pose proof (inj_cF_1 m Hmap) as Hinj. pose proof (surj_cF m Hmap) as Hsurj. specialize (Hinj m Hmap) as [Hinj1 Hinj2]. apply Hsurj. apply Hinj1. apply Hexd.
